summary: This bill, the Department of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026, allocates funds for various federal agencies. It covers funding for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, including programs related to workforce development, healthcare, education for disadvantaged students, special education, and related agencies. It includes provisions on abortion, discrimination, and other social and political issues. The bill also includes provisions to prevent funding for specific entities, research on gun violence and research on the effects of drugs and body alteration, along with various prohibitions and limitations.
